testcase.name: DBA.FR109
testcase.description: DBA.FR109: There are accounting systems whose periods overlap

variation.name: Invalid-109a
variation.description: There are two periods. The start of one period, (StartDateForUseOfDigitalStandardBookkeepingSystem), is before the start of the reporting period and the second period ends, (EndDateForUseOfDigitalStandardBookkeepingSystem), after the end of the reporting period, thus overlapping the reporting period.

variation.name: Invalid-109b
variation.description:
This tests detection of non-standard reporting periods. There are two periods. The start of one period, (StartDateForUseOfDigitalStandardBookkeepingSystem), is before the start of the reporting period and the second period ends, (EndDateForUseOfDigitalStandardBookkeepingSystem), after the end of the reporting period, thus overlapping the reporting period.
The reporting period is defined using the RegisteredReportingPeriodDeviatingFromReportedReportingPeriodDueArbitraryDatesMember
